snippet: EITINGON--Mark, age 91, on April 25th in Paris, France. Preceded in death by parents Solomon and Louisa, survived by wife, Brigitte, sons Danny (Michael Lambkin) and Michael (Nancy Kaplan), grandchildren Josh (Jessica Stromstedt) Jennifer, Samantha Levy-Wehr (Michael Wehr), Jessica Lippke (Derek), great granddaughter Shayna Wehr, sisters Mary-Rose Kasindorf and Phyllis Grann, friends, former business associates, and former employees and their families. 1/3
lead_paragraph: EITINGON--Mark, age 91, on April 25th in Paris, France. Preceded in death by parents Solomon and Louisa, survived by wife, Brigitte, sons Danny (Michael Lambkin) and Michael (Nancy Kaplan), grandchildren Josh (Jessica Stromstedt) Jennifer, Samantha Levy-Wehr (Michael Wehr), Jessica Lippke (Derek), great granddaughter Shayna Wehr, sisters Mary-Rose Kasindorf and Phyllis Grann, friends, former business associates, and former employees and their families. 1/3
